conbody.p: (a) See Annex 4 for STRL deviations applicable hereto.

(b)(2)(i)(A) Submit the determination and findings under DFARS 211.274-2(b)(2)(i)(A) via DASN(P) by email at RDAJ&As.fct @navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 211.274-2(b)(2)(i)(A) – D&F – Exception to Item Unique Identification Marking.”
